column5: I was wondering if the part of the kam river in thunder bay at the end of john street is any good for fishing? What would I catch, and the place is called hume falls.

THE HUME RD.  side you won't catch alot maybe some bass. The end of john rd. side you can get walleye bass pike. i also was told by some guys if you canoe to the island in the middle you can do aiight too.  Cheers,  PMack
I have caught walleye, pike, and bass from the Hume side, have never fished it from the John St. side. It's been a long time since I was there though.
I've caught on the Hume side but its got alot of fishing preasure on it these days, pretty slow....
